verses.name: Matthew 14:11
verses.text: And his head was brought in a charger, and given to the damsel: and she brought it to her mother.

verses.name: Matthew 14:12
verses.text: And his disciples came, and took up the body, and buried it, and went and told Jesus.

verses.name: Matthew 14:13
verses.text: When Jesus heard of it, he departed thence by ship into a desert place apart: and when the people had heard thereof, they followed him on foot out of the cities.

verses.name: Matthew 14:14
verses.text: And Jesus went forth, and saw a great multitude, and was moved with compassion toward them, and he healed their sick.
